ingredients: 1/4 cup all-purpose flour; 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper; 1/4 teaspoon salt; 1 onion; cooking spray
recipe: Preheat air fryer to 375°F (190°C). Combine flour, cayenne, and salt. Coat onion slices. Place onions in basket, spray with oil, and air fry for 18-23 minutes, shaking every 4-5 minutes.

what food to make: Air Fryer Hot Honey Glazed Carrots
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray; 2 tablespoons butter; 3 tablespoons hot honey; 1 pound baby carrots
recipe: Preheat air fryer to 400°F (200°C). Coat carrots with butter and hot honey. Air fry 15-22 minutes, tossing occasionally. Toss in remaining sauce before serving.

ingredients: 1 large onion; 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil; salt and pepper
recipe: Preheat air fryer to 400°F (200°C). Toss sliced onions with oil, salt, and pepper. Air fry 10 minutes, shake, then cook 2 more minutes.

ingredients: manicotti pasta; ground beef; taco seasoning; green chiles; canned tomatoes with green chiles; shredded Cheddar cheese; eggs; milk or half-and-half; tortilla chips; toppings of choice
recipe: Cook pasta 6 minutes and rinse. Brown beef and mix with seasoning, chiles, tomatoes, and cheese. Stuff pasta and freeze 30 minutes. Dip in egg wash, coat with crushed tortilla chips. Air fry at 400°F (200°C) for 10–12 minutes. Serve with toppings.

ingredients: Canned light tuna; 1 ripe avocado; chopped celery; lemon juice; salt; pepper
recipe: Mash avocado, mix with drained light tuna, celery, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve on toast or crackers.

what food to make: Grilled Lamb Chops with Mint Yogurt Sauce
ingredients: Lamb chops; olive oil; garlic; salt; pepper; Greek yogurt; mint; lemon juice
recipe: Season lamb and grill. Mix yogurt, mint, and lemon juice for sauce. Serve together.

ingredients: Greek yogurt (pasteurized); fresh berries; granola; honey (optional)
recipe: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a glass. Drizzle honey if desired.

what food to make: Veggie Omelet with Spinach and Feta
ingredients: Eggs; spinach; bell peppers; onions; feta cheese (pasteurized); salt; pepper
recipe: Cook vegetables, add beaten eggs, sprinkle feta, fold and cook through.
pregnancy_safe: Yes (ensure feta is pasteurized and eggs fully cooked)
